metadata.feature_description: Reorder templates in hierarchy by dragging and dropping them to new positions

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify drag handles visible on template items

steps.expected: Templates panel opens with list of page templates
steps.actual: Templates panel opened successfully showing templates in a grid/card layout

steps.action: Examine template cards for drag handles
steps.expected: Drag handles visible on template items as described in feature specification
steps.actual: No drag handles visible on any template cards. Only thumbnails and template names displayed

steps.action: Hover over template card to reveal any hidden controls
steps.expected: Drag handle or reordering control appears on hover
steps.actual: Only an 'Edit' button appeared on hover. No drag handle visible

issues: Drag handles are not visible in the Templates UI grid/card view
Feature description mentions 'Drag handle on template items' but no such UI element exists in the current view

steps.action: Attempt to drag 'Test Template Page' template card to position of 'Cavalier - Main'
steps.expected: Template card should be draggable and drop at new position, reordering the template list
steps.actual: Drag operation executed via Playwright but no visual feedback or reordering occurred. Template order remained unchanged

steps.action: Verify template order after drag attempt
steps.expected: Template order should have changed after drop
steps.actual: Template order remained exactly the same: Cavalier - Main, Test Template Page, Workflow Test Template, etc.

issues: Drag and drop functionality does not work on template cards in the current grid view
DOM inspection revealed hidden ui-sortable elements exist but are not active/visible in the current view
No hierarchical view toggle or alternative view available to enable drag-drop functionality

observations: DOM inspection revealed existence of hidden ui-sortable and ui-droppable elements (isVisible: false), suggesting drag-drop code exists but is not active in the current grid/card view
The feature specification mentions 'templatesHierarchy.js' which implies a hierarchical tree view may be needed for drag-drop, but no such view is accessible from the current UI
Templates are displayed in a flat grid/card layout with no visible hierarchy or parent-child relationships
The only controls available in the Templates panel header are a Search box and 'Add Template' button - no view toggle option exists
Code repository was empty at the specified path so code analysis could not be performed to determine if feature is partially implemented or deprecated
